subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had 10 points, 14 assists and 13 rebounds for his ninth triple-double of the season. Equally important, he shut down Joe Johnson in the visiting Nets’ 113-107 victory against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday night.
snippet: Jason Kidd had 10 points, 14 assists and 13 rebounds for his ninth triple-double of the season. Equally important, he shut down Joe Johnson in the visiting Nets’ 113-107 victory against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday night.
